# Football Website Project Setup

## Project Overview
A football website with React frontend and Node.js/Express backend for testing with Playwright.

## Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold React frontend with Vite
- [x] Create Node.js/Express backend
- [x] Add football data and components
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Create run tasks
- [x] Test and verify setup

## Project Structure
- `/frontend` - React application with Vite
- `/backend` - Node.js/Express API server

## Development
- Frontend runs on http://localhost:5173
- Backend runs on http://localhost:3001
